home.subHeading: By synergizing cutting-edge phytoscientific research with industry-leading expertise, we are dedicated to pioneering the development of evidence-based phytotherapeutic solutions. Through collaborative innovation, we aim to deliver transformative phytomedical advancements that address unmet clinical needs and elevate patient care standards.

about.title: About
about.vision: To pioneer a transformative future in healthcare where plant-based medicines lead therapeutic innovation, fostering global wellness and environmental sustainability for generations.
about.mission: We are dedicated to advancing phytomedicines through the fusion of traditional botanical wisdom and modern scientific rigor. Committed to ethical sourcing and sustainable practices, we deliver safe, effective, and accessible natural therapies that enhance health outcomes while preserving our planet.

teamMembersPartOne.name: Datuk Dr. Mukundan Pillay
teamMembersPartOne.bio: Datuk Dr. Mukundan Pillay is a distinguished leader renowned for his transformative contributions to healthcare systems in Malaysia and globally. Over a 32-year career with the Malaysian Ministry of Health, he spearheaded critical initiatives in health infrastructure, policy, and research. Post-retirement, he extended his expertise to international organizations, including the World Bank in Bahrain and the World Health Organization (WHO) in China, while remaining actively engaged in advancing Malaysia’s healthcare landscape.

teamMembersPartOne.name: M. Paramesswaran
teamMembersPartOne.bio:
Public Health Advocate.

- Spearheaded community-based health initiatives for 15+ years, promoting plant-based wellness and preventive care as sustainable, accessible alternatives to conventional healthcare, reaching 500+ individuals annually through workshops, seminars, and one-on-one consultations.
- Collaborated with local NGOs, wellness centers, and holistic health practitioners to design culturally sensitive educational programs on phyto-based medicine, improving health literacy in underserved communities.
- Advocated for integrative health policies by partnering with regional public health coalitions, contributing research on phytotherapy’s role in chronic disease prevention to inform community health strategies.

teamMembersPartOne.name: Dr. Furizat
teamMembersPartOne.designation: Director of Product Innovation and Compliance
teamMembersPartOne.bio:
Dr. Furizat Yahya, PhD
N.D., D.H.D (AM), D.O.H.M. (AM), ABE (London)

Pioneer in Phytomedicine Innovation & Natural Healthcare Leadership.

Dr. Furizat Yahya is a distinguished leader in phytomedicine and natural healthcare, renowned for her expertise in merging traditional knowledge with modern scientific rigor, and a Doctor of Natural Medicine (N.D.) from the Indian Board of Alternative Medicine, she specializes in sustainable commercialization strategies for plant-derived medicines.

Professional Leadership:
- Co-Founder & Chief Scientific Officer, Bio-Spectra, a trailblazing brand delivering evidence-based, plant-derived therapeutic solutions.
- Secretary General, Malaysia Association of Natural Medicine Practitioners (MANMP) – Championing ethical standards, education, and policy reform in natural healthcare.

Key Contributions:
- Spearheaded the design and commercialization of breakthrough phytopharmaceutical formulations.
- Advocate for regulatory advancements in Southeast Asia’s natural medicine sector.

Research Focus:
- Clinical validation of traditional phytomedicines.
- Scalable business models for natural product industries.
- Integrative approaches to holistic healthcare.

teamMembersPartSecond.name: P. Vasanthan
teamMembersPartSecond.bio:
With over a decade of experience in corporate operations and business strategy, Vasanthan specializes in driving efficiency, optimizing processes, and ensuring seamless cross-functional collaboration. He holds a Diploma in Corporate Operations & Business Management and is a certified expert in corporate strategy and process optimization.

As a leader in operational efficiency and process innovation, he has successfully streamlined workflows, reduced costs, and implemented automation strategies that boosted productivity. His expertise extends to stakeholder management, corporate governance, supply chain optimization, and crisis mitigation, ensuring business continuity in dynamic environments.

Vasanthan’s strategic vision and leadership enable organizations to scale efficiently while maintaining operational excellence.

teamMembersPartSecond.name: Dr. Srivalli
teamMembersPartSecond.bio:
Dr. Srivalli Narayanaswamy is a distinguished expert in integrative and natural medicine, with over four decades of experience in the field. Her educational background includes an M.B.B.S. from Madras Medical University, Tamil Nadu, India, a Ph.D. in Alternative Medicine with a specialization in Phytomedicine, a Doctor of Science (D.Sc.) in Naturopathy from Sri Lanka, and an Honorary Doctorate in Natural Medicine from Weston Reserve University, Canada.

As a professional leader, Dr. Narayanaswamy has been an active member of the Malaysian Red Crescent Society for 45 years, serving since 1970. She holds the position of Chapter Leader for Naturopathy and is a Council Member of the Malaysian Society for Complementary Medicine. Additionally, she is a member of the International Scientific and Research Council for Complementary Medicine.

Throughout her career, Dr. Narayanaswamy has been recognized for her lifelong dedication to advancing natural and integrative therapies, contributing significantly to the development of complementary medicine on both national and international platforms.

advisoryGroupPartOne.name: Dr. Parasuraman
advisoryGroupPartOne.bio:
Dr. N. Parasuraman is a distinguished scientist specializing in sustainable agriculture policy, biodiversity conservation, and rural development. He has held key leadership roles, including serving on the Planning Boards of Pondicherry and Periyar Universities and as a Senate Member for Bharathiar, Madras, and Bharathidasan Universities.

He has contributed to national policy as a member of the National Biodiversity Authority of India and the Tamil Nadu Government's 12th Five-Year Plan Committee. Internationally, he is a long-standing member of the International Water Resources Association and a Fellow of the Indian Academy of Social Sciences.

Dr. Parasuraman actively advises governments and institutions on agriculture, environment, and rural development, reinforcing his commitment to sustainable growth and youth empowerment. He is also affiliated with the Indian Science Congress Association, the Centre for Agriculture & Rural Development, and ICAR-NRC on Biotechnology.

advisoryGroupPartSecond.name: Dr. Sunita
advisoryGroupPartSecond.bio:
Dr. Sunita Vidyarthi is a leading expert in sustainable energy and crisis leadership, with a PhD in Solar Energy from Uttarakhand Technical University and an Honorary PhD in Sustainable Development from Maryland State University, USA. She holds dual M.Tech degrees in Renewable Energy (NIT Kurukshetra) and Control Systems (GEU, Dehradun).

As the Regional Coordinator for I-STEM (IISc, Bengaluru), she plays a key role in advancing STEM innovation and infrastructure across India.

During the COVID-19 pandemic, Dr. Vidyarthi demonstrated leadership by facilitating national virtual conferences and spearheading digital outreach initiatives for crisis communication. Her expertise spans renewable energy systems, STEM policy, and strategic communication in high-impact scenarios.
